name: Cael Meta Morph Demo Version
description:
*** INITIALIZING PROJECT ALICE *** *** STARTING LIFE SUPPORT SYSTEM *** *** STARTING SELF-LEARNING SYSTEM *** *** STARTING COMBAT BEHAVIOUR *** *** REBOOT COMPLETED ***

Play as Alice, our cute Protagonist, and enjoy a different kind of side-shooter.

Battle through never-ending bullet swarm and robots.

Upgrade your skills and abilities as you progress the story.

Fight against dangerous bosses and save the world.

Developer's note : If you have any feedback, kindly send email to caelgamesstudio@gmail.com. Any feedback is welcome.
